item.description:
Free event! January meeting of the Boston New Tech Meetup - 25th edition!

Come learn about 7 innovative and exciting technology products and network with the Boston/Cambridge startup community! Each presenter gets 5 minutes for product demonstration and 5 minutes for Q&A. Please follow @BostonNewTech and use the #BNT25 hashtag in social media posts: details here.

1. QuadWrangle, Inc. / @QuadWrangleInc - Mobile/social platform connects alumni and their schools for mutual benefit. (Nick Zeckets / @NickOnBiz) http://Quadwrangle.com

2. Petmobi / @PetMobi - Health & fitness social networking mobile app for pets. (Alex Papanicholas) http://PetMobi.com

3. Culture Adapt / @CultureAdapt - Online education platform and local campus helps international individuals understand a new culture and accelerate their careers. (Michael Miller / @MMiller1222) http://CultureAdapt.com

4. Pymetrics / @Pymetrics - Neuroscience-based assessment and prediction technology transforms the way companies hire, retain, and develop their employees. (Claude Burns) http://Pymetrics.com

5. Landing Page Builder / @HighImpactD - Helps you create landing pages online with ease and perform A/B Testing. Increase leads, conversions & profits! (Jim Kinlan / @JKinlan) http://HighImpactDesigner.com

6. PreApps / @Pre_Apps - Exclusive place to preview, rate, and download mobile apps before they are publicly released. (Sean Casto) http://PreApps.com

7. ParkMe Parking Widget / @ParkMe - Drives "traffic" to local merchants in congested areas by helping customers find parking nearby. (Eric Sonnabend) http://ParkMe.biz

Agenda:

6:30 to 7:30 - Networking with beverages and snacks, provided by the organizers (5th floor)

7:30 to 7:40 - Announcements (6th floor)

7:40 to 9:00 - Presentations, Q&A (6th floor)

9:00 - More networking over drinks/dinner at ArtBar, at 40 Edwin H Land Blvd, Cambridge. (optional) Walking directions here.

Directions & Parking:

Public Transportation: HULT is a 5 minute walk from the Lechmere MBTA station on the Green Line.  Head north on East St and take the first right onto Glassworks Ave. Walk 4 blocks and turn left on Museum Way. HULT will be one block up on your right. Use this Google Map.

Driving directions: Use this Google Map. There are about 30 parking meters within one block, on North Point Blvd and Education St. If they are full, park at the Museum of Science Garage: $8 after 5pm, open until 11pm. There is also parking at Lechmere Station and CambridgeSide Galeria. Valet parking is available right next to HULT at the Regatta Riverview Condominium.

Venue Sponsor:

Meeting space has been graciously provided by:


 

 

 

HULT International Business School - Established in 1964, HULT International Business School is the fastest growing international business school world wide. Ranked as #1 for International Experience as well as #17 best business schools in the U.S. by the Financial Times, Hult holds five campuses at major business locations: Boston, San Francisco, London, Dubai, Sao Paulo, New York, and Shanghai. Follow @HULT_Biz and join them on facebook. www.HULT.edu
item.how_to_find_us: Wait for an usher to escort you through security and to the 5th floor.
item.name: January 2013 Boston New Technology Meetup #bnt25
